description:
Giroro`s test flight of a new spaceship has run into a terrible danger, and he`s afraid he`ll never make it back safely again.  Worse, Natsumi`s towel apparently slipped, and his video feed wasn`t on to see it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Impossible Escape?! / Keroro, Impossible Rescue?!
ギロロ 脱出不可能?! であります / ケロロ 救出不可能?! であります
